           throws RepositoryException,

        void logout(java.lang.String token)
            throws RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException
        Log out from the repository.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException
        DatabaseException

      • grantUser

        void grantUser(java.lang.String token,
             java.lang.String nodePath,
             java.lang.String user,
             int permissions,
             boolean recursive)
               throws PathNotFoundException,
                      AccessDeniedException,
                      RepositoryException,
                      DatabaseException
        Add user permissions to a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        user - User name which permissions are changed.
        permissions - A mask with the permissions to be added.
        recursive - recursive If the nodePath indicated a folder, the permissions can be applied recursively.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • revokeUser

        void revokeUser(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String nodePath,
              java.lang.String user,
              int permissions,
              boolean recursive)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Revoke user permissions from a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        user - User name which permissions are changed.
        permissions - A mask with the permissions to be removed.
        recursive - If the nodePath indicates a folder, the permissions can be revoked recursively.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getGrantedUsers

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGrantedUsers(java.lang.String token,
                                                                java.lang.String nodePath)
                                                                  throws PathNotFoundException,
                                                                         AccessDeniedException,
                                                                         RepositoryException,
                                                                         DatabaseException
        Get user permissions from am item (document or folder).
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        返回:
        A hashmap with pairs of user / permissions.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • grantRole

        void grantRole(java.lang.String token,
             java.lang.String nodePath,
             java.lang.String role,
             int permissions,
             boolean recursive)
               throws PathNotFoundException,
                      AccessDeniedException,
                      RepositoryException,
                      DatabaseException
        Grant role permissions for a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        role - Role name which permissions are changed.
        permissions - A mask with the permissions to be added.
        recursive - If the nodePath indicates a folder, the permissions can be applied recursively.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • revokeRole

        void revokeRole(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String nodePath,
              java.lang.String role,
              int permissions,
              boolean recursive)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Revoke role permissions from a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        role - Role name which permissions are changed.
        permissions - A mask with the permissions to be removed.
        recursive - If the nodePath indicates a folder, the permissions can be applied recursively.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getGrantedRoles

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGrantedRoles(java.lang.String token,
                                                                java.lang.String nodePath)
                                                                  throws PathNotFoundException,
                                                                         AccessDeniedException,
                                                                         RepositoryException,
                                                                         DatabaseException
        Get roles permissions from am item (document or folder).
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        返回:
        A hashmap with pairs of role / permissions.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getUsers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers(java.lang.String token)
                                          throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Retrieves a list of repository users
        返回:
        A collection of repository users.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any error retrieving the users list.
        PrincipalAdapterException

      • getMail

        java.lang.String getMail(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String user)
                         throws PrincipalAdapterException
        Retrieves the mail from an user.
        参数:
        users - The user id.
        返回:
        A email of the user.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any error retrieving the mail.
        PrincipalAdapterException

                       java.lang.String user)

        参数:
        users - The user id.
        返回:
        A name of the user.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any error retrieving the mail.

                    throws PathNotFoundException,
